overview: Rock's original Renaissance man, Todd Rundgren -- who's also a producer, writer, founder of the band Utopia and general music maverick -- rocks the house in this live show. Recorded at the Tokyo Sun Plaza Hall and featuring a remastered soundtrack, this dynamic performance includes the songs "Real Man," "Unloved Children," "Parallel Lines," "Can't Stop Running," "Compassion," "Secret Society," "Love of the Common Man" and more.
title: Todd Rundgren: Live in Japan
